title: The Lost Girls: Three Friends. Four Continents. One Unconventional Detour Around the World.
description: Three friends, each on the brink of a quarter-life crisis, make a pact to quit their high pressure New York City media jobs and leave behind their friends, boyfriends, and everything familiar to embark on a year-long backpacking adventure around the world in The Lost Girls.
author: Jennifer Baggett
